product.title: Peter Pan: Return to Neverland | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Peter Pan: Return to Neverland

In this long-awaited sequel to the classic tale of Peter Pan, Wendy returns as an adult, raising her two children in a world that’s been battered by World War II. To give her children hope, Wendy recounts her magical experiences with Peter Pan in Neverland, but her daughter Jane refuses to believe the tales. Meanwhile, Captain Hook mistakes Jane for Wendy, and abducts her in an effort to lure and capture Peter Pan. When Peter Pan returns to Neverland to rescue Jane, the young girl soon discovers that she must believe in the magic of her own imagination to return home safely.

Tie-in Activity: Embrace your child’s flights of fancy by engaging her in fantasy play. Put together a box filled with “magic” scarves, wands, capes, and hats, and encourage her to pretend that she’s frolicking in Neverland with Peter Pan, Wendy, and Jane.
